author: BBC News
description: After 146 years, the Ringling Bros and Barnum & Bailey Circus holds its final show in New York.
title: Ringling Brothers circus stages last show in New York

author: Gina Cherelus
description: The clowns, animal acts and acrobats of the storied Ringling Bros and Barnum & Bailey Circus are taking their final bow at an arena outside New York City on Sunday in the farewell performance of the "Greatest Show on Earth" after nearly 150 years.
title: 'Greatest Show on Earth' takes its final bow after 146 years

author: TAMARA LUSH
description: UNIONDALE, N.Y. (AP) â€” Ringling Bros. and Barnum & Bailey Circus began its final show Sunday evening after 146 years of wowing audiences with its "Greatest Show on Earth." Earlier in the day, as the circus performed its second-to-last show at the Nassau County Coliseum in Uniondale, New York, about 30 miles (48 kilometers) east of New York City, a group of retired and former circus performers sat across the street at a hotel bar, laughing and hugging and sharing memories of tours past. "There's a lot of mixed emotions, said Rev. George "Jerry" Hogan, Ringling's circus chaplain. "It's a reunion, but it's bittersweet. I'm seeing people I haven't seen in years."
title: Ringling's final show commences after 146 years
